anthropic_config.system: A vintage architectural infographic of  that blends art and technical clarity: a detailed front elevation at the center, a clean line-art landscape of  behind it, and annotated dimension lines with sample values like “” and “”. Surrounded by 2–3 close-up detail boxes and a “Site plan – ” panel, the piece uses pen-and-ink hatching on warm aged paper to feel like a hand-drawn architectural study sheet.

usage_example.python:
from anthropic import Anthropic

client = Anthropic()

message = client.messages.create(
    model="claude-sonnet-4-20250514",
    max_tokens=4096,
    system="""A vintage architectural infographic of  that blends art and technical clarity: a detailed front elev...""",
    messages=[
        {"role": "user", "content": "Your message here"}
    ]
)
print(message.content[0].text)
